scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp package.json www/package.json && mkdir www/tmp/ && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.build-win1: npm run clean && echo (1 of 5) - Cleaned www directory && tsc && echo (2 of 5) - Transpiled TS to JS && copy package.json www && echo (3 of 5) - Copied package.json to www directory && cd www && mkdir tmp && echo (4 of 5) - Created tmp directory && powershell Compress-Archive ./* Archive.zip && echo (5 of 5) - Archived the contents of the www directory && cd ..
scripts.build-win: npm run clean && echo (1 of 5) - Cleaned www directory && tsc && echo (2 of 5) - Transpiled TS to JS && copy package.json www && echo (3 of 5) - Copied package.json to www directory && cd www && mkdir tmp && echo (4 of 5) - Created tmp directory && zip a -r Archive.zip && echo (5 of 5) - Archived the contents of the www directory && cd ..
